Name: Electro Crystalfly
Desc: Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting Electro particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.\nA glittering Electro creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Electro.\nCould the flashing light in the dark night be the entrusted faith of a certain someone...
